title: KHR_physics_rigid_bodies Node Joint Property
description: Parameters describing how the relative motion of a pair of nodes is constrained.

connectedNode.description: The index of the node to which this is connected.

joint.description: The index of the joint in the top level physicsJoints array.

enableCollision.description: If true, allow the connected objects to collide. Connected objects do not collide by default.
